hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Thursday Green - Inside Udaipur City Palace
hiveArticle.body:
My entry for today's #colorchallenge is a sneak peek inside Udaipur City Palace. The image was taken on 2nd floor of Udaipur City Palace in Udaipur, Rajasthan, India. Yes, you heard it right, it is actually a 2nd floor where you can see benches as well as a lot of trees around.

<hr>

### 2nd floor of Udaipur City Palace

<hr>

![IMG_20170302_105310586.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUNwtaZjAdPHN9vMXSS9xWHLkm1Cioy6oiSHqxpsSDZW4/IMG_20170302_105310586.jpg)

![IMG_20170302_104622651.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRVfVoPUssX1gUsZSC1DNjHtcogZTgXbSUKgznySPgmUf/IMG_20170302_104622651.jpg)

<hr>

### Camera: Nokia 6

<hr>

### Follow @codingdefined
